name: mapChunks
signature: { <A, B>(f: (chunk: Chunk<A>) => Chunk<B>): <E, R>(self: Stream<A, E, R>) => Stream<B, E, R>; <A, E, R, B>(self: Stream<A, E, R>, f: (chunk: Chunk<A>) => Chunk<B>): Stream<B, E, R>; }
description: Transforms the chunks emitted by this stream.
